Package org.theusaf.BattlefieldChess.util

Class AudioCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.theusaf.BattlefieldChess.util.AudioCache
  • public class AudioCache
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a cache for sounds.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AudioCache​(processing.core.PApplet sketch)
      Constructs an audio cache.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AudioCache

        public AudioCache​(processing.core.PApplet sketch)
        Constructs an audio cache.
        Parameters:
        sketch - The sketch to generate the sound files upon

    • Method Detail

      • getAudio

        public processing.sound.SoundFile getAudio​(java.lang.String key)
        Gets the specified sound from the cache.
        Parameters:
        key - The path to the sound file.
        Returns:
        The cached sound. If the sound is not in the cache, returns null. The sound will then be asynchronously loaded and cached.

      • removeAudio

        public void removeAudio​(java.lang.String key)
        Removes audio from the cache.
        Parameters:
        key - The path to the audio file to remove from the cache
